author: perrotta
body:
#### PR description:

Unit test "TestGeneratorInterfacePythia8ConcurrentGeneratorFilter" is currently failing in the IBs.
It is due to a modified address in the pdmv repository of the GEN fragment needed for the test:
From: cms-pdmv.cern.ch
To: cms-pdmv-prod.web.cern.ch

#### PR validation:

`scram b runtests` works without errors


#### Bacports

The unit test error is there in all releases: if we want to fix it, this simple fix should be backported in all them
title: Correct url of the GEN fragment taken from a pdmv area
